messages.subject: OT: Goats.....herbal care
messages.msgSnippet: I am soo excited, I finally convinced my husband to let me get a goat....she s beautiful....her name is Dream Song Navajo  .......and I was dreaming about her
messages.messageBody: I am soo excited, I finally convinced my husband to let me get a goat....she's beautiful....her name is Dream Song Navajo  .......and I was dreaming about her all nite......I've been wanting one, and was working at the fair all weekend.....th emain 4h goat lady , decided all her goats but 2 which was about 10 were going to auction, and I couldn't resist...her temperment is so pleasant..she kisses....she's beautiful.   DOes anyone have any suggestions on info for herbal care for goats, I actually took care of goats at an Herbal farm last year but I'm looking for some on-line resources.....perhaps perhaps a Susan Weed site, or Juliette ?????what was that neat old woman last name, so I can get her book......Farm & Stable???? help me with this one......Thanks. Many Blessings. michelle*
